content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction setup at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3) that produces iron sticks
- Assembling machine (position x4) that produces iron gear wheels
- Inserters (position a1, a2) that put into assembling machines
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machines at positions x3 and x4

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to crafting machines
- Ensure that the required crafting machines or furnaces are available and operational before trying to craft items that depend on them.
